title: This is the third time I have got Amethyst Ashe from the Hextech Crafting
body: I don't see why I get only the one skin. There is over 100 skins and I get the one over and over. Does anybody have a reason for the rng to be spitting out the same skin?

replies.body: Don't delete the shard, because I don't think you can have duplicate of the same shard. But of course can get the same thing multiple times if you keep deleting. I may be wrong though.
I have got lee sin 4 times, 2 of which were in a row, and another on that same day. The chances are minimal, but chances they still are.
Just really, REALLY bad luck? o-o
